resources.string: Email field should not be empty!
Email should be more than 7 but less than 35 symbols!
Username field should not be empty!
Username should be at least 10 but less than 35 symbols
First name field should not be empty!
First name should be less than 25 symbols!
Last name field should not be empty!
Last name should be less than 25 symbols!
Age cannot be zero and must be less than hundred!
